thread.title: Mary Tyler Moore Dies At Age 80

author: jnosek1
title: Mary Tyler Moore Dies At Age 80

organizations.name: getty images your privacy rights canadian customers  actress

text:
Mary Tyler Moore Dies At Age 80 The beloved television icon was a huge advocate for diabetes research By Andrew Daniels January 25, 2017 Getty Images Your Privacy Rights Canadian Customers 
Actress Mary Tyler Moore, who starred in her popular eponymous television show in the 1970s and The Dick Van Dyke Show a decade before that, passed away today at the age of 80. Though a cause of death wasn’t given, Moore had a history of health problems, and had lived with diabetes since being diagnosed at age 33. In addition to her groundbreaking television roles, Moore, a Type 1 diabetic, was an advocate for the Juvenile Diabetes Research Foundation. “Mary will be remembered as a fearless visionary who turned the world on with her smile ,” her publicist said in a statement to PEOPLE .
